Interface Checker

All Known Implementing Classes:
StaticChecker
public interface Checker
The checker interface defines the contract for all finite state machine syntactic and semantic checkers.

  • Method Details

    • createMessage

      default String createMessage(Checker.Level level, ResourceBundle bundle, String key, Object... parameters)
      Creates a message for the checker.
      Parameters:
      level - the level of the message
      bundle - the bundle containing the localized text
      key - the key to select the localized text
      parameters - the parameters of the message
      Returns:
      the formatted localized message

    • createError

      default String createError(ResourceBundle bundle, String key, Object... parameters)
      Creates an error message for the checker.
      Parameters:
      bundle - the bundle containing the localized text
      key - the key to select the localized text
      parameters - the parameters of the message
      Returns:
      the formatted localized message
